arts.ttl: Michael Owen reveals Sir Alex Ferguson desperation after making Man Utd admission
arts.sum: More than a decade after leaving Manchester United, racing enthusiast Michael Owen is "desperate" to engineer a new working relationship with his ex-Old Trafford boss

arts.ttl: Man United legend Wayne Rooney opens up on being 'absolutely battered' by Sir Alex Ferguson as he reveals the worst 'hairdryer' treatment of his career
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney has recalled when he and Sir Alex Ferguson came to blows in the dressing room, having clashed at Portsmouth during the 2009-10 campaign.
